title: Check if Object Is Deep Frozen
description: In this lab, we will learn how to check if an object is deeply frozen in JavaScript. The lab will guide us through a recursive function that uses Object.isFrozen() to determine if an object is frozen and Object.keys() with Array.prototype.every() to check all keys for deep freezing. By the end of this lab, we will have a better understanding of how to determine the deep freezing status of an object in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering Deep Object Freezing in JavaScript
meta.description: Discover the secrets of deeply freezing objects in JavaScript with our comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, recursion, object freezing, javascript practice online, javascript lab, deep freeze, javascript tutor, object properties

steps.title: Check if Object Is Deep Frozen

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 检查对象是否被深度冻结
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习如何在JavaScript中检查一个对象是否被深度冻结。本实验将引导我们完成一个递归函数，该函数使用Object.isFrozen()来确定一个对象是否被冻结，并使用Object.keys()和Array.prototype.every()来检查所有键是否被深度冻结。在本实验结束时，我们将更好地理解如何确定JavaScript中对象的深度冻结状态。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的深度对象冻结
meta.description: 通过我们全面的教程，探索JavaScript中深度冻结对象的秘密。
